game.name: Fast Food Simulator
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 세상에서 가장 혼란스러운 장소에 오신 것을 환영합니다! 혼자 또는 최대 6명의 플레이어와 협동 플레이를 즐겨보세요. 패스트푸드 레스토랑을 운영하고 친구들과 협력하여 비즈니스를 확장하세요. 주문을 받고, 햄버거를 만들고, 고객을 상대하여 수입을 늘리세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Welcome to the world's most chaotic place! Play solo or co-op with up to 6 players. Run a fast-food restaurant, and work with your friends to expand your business. Take orders, make burgers, and increase your earnings by dealing with customers.

reviewHighlights.text: AI art is still AI usage from lazy devs. game progression is pretty barebones and just isnt fun long-term. pretty buggy and bland.
Awesome fun i think adding some staff that cook also would be amazing for solo play as it gets quite overwhelming when alone
